mapper.select: select * from ( ( select * from (SELECT * from goods left join goods_like using (p_id) where p_id in ( SELECT p_id from goods left join goods_like using (p_id) GROUP by p_id HAVING COUNT(p_id) > 1 ) and user_id != #{loginId} and p_id not in ( SELECT p_id from goods left join goods_like using (p_id) where p_id in ( SELECT p_id from goods left join goods_like using (p_id) GROUP by p_id HAVING COUNT(p_id) > 1 ) and user_id = #{loginId} ) ) where rowid in (select max(rowid) from (SELECT * from goods left join goods_like using (p_id) where p_id in ( SELECT p_id from goods left join goods_like using (p_id) GROUP by p_id HAVING COUNT(p_id) > 1 ) and user_id != #{loginId} and p_id not in ( SELECT p_id from goods left join goods_like using (p_id) where p_id in ( SELECT p_id from goods left join goods_like using (p_id) GROUP by p_id HAVING COUNT(p_id) > 1 ) and user_id = #{loginId} )) group by p_id) ) union (SELECT * from goods left join goods_like using (p_id) where p_id in ( SELECT p_id from goods left join goods_like using (p_id) GROUP by p_id HAVING COUNT(p_id) > 1 ) and user_id = #{loginId} ) union (select * from goods left join goods_like using (p_id) where p_id not in ( SELECT p_id from goods left join goods_like using (p_id) GROUP by p_id HAVING COUNT(p_id) > 1) ) ) where p_id in (select distinct p_id from goods_option) order by p_id desc
select * from goods_option o left join goods g on o.p_id = g.p_id left join option_detail d on o.option_id = d.option_id where g.p_id = #{pId}
mapper.insert: insert into goods_cart(cart_id, p_id, option_id, member_id, cart_quantity) values( seq_goods_cart_id.nextval, #{pId}, #{optionId}, #{memberId}, #{cartQty} )

insert into order_detail select seq_order_detail_no.nextval as order_detail_no, #{orderNo} as order_no, e.p_id, e.option_id, e.cart_quantity as quantity from goods_cart e where member_id = #{memberId}
